com.tedros.settings.layout.template

Class AbstractSettingsLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.Parent
        • javafx.scene.layout.Region
          • javafx.scene.layout.Pane
            • javafx.scene.layout.StackPane
              • com.tedros.settings.layout.template.AbstractSettingsLayout
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.event.EventTarget
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LinearSettingsLayout, RadialSettingsLayout

    public abstract class AbstractSettingsLayout
extends javafx.scene.layout.StackPane
    Abstract class which contains the common fields for both "Linear Settings layout" and "Radial Settings Layout".
    Author:
    Sai.Dandem

      • getColorStopTemplate

        protected javafx.scene.layout.HBox getColorStopTemplate(int startValue,
                                            int endValue,
                                            int pos,
                                            int finalPos,
                                            java.lang.String color)
        Returns the color stop row template.
        Parameters:
        startValue - - Start value of the slider.
        endValue - - End value of the slider.
        pos - - Default value of the slider
        finalPos - - Position to which the color stop need to be added.
        Returns:
        HBox

      • addNewColorStop

        private void addNewColorStop(javafx.scene.layout.HBox current)
        Method to add a new ColorStop row in the list and the layout. Called on click of "+" button.
        Parameters:
        current - - Current color template row to determine the position.

      • deleteColorStop

        private void deleteColorStop(javafx.scene.layout.HBox current)
        Method to remove the color stop row from the list and the layout. Called on click of "X" button.
        Parameters:
        current - - Current color template row to determine the position.

        Returns:
        position.
